title: When Dot added the median turn lanes on Eastwood they had to make provisions for U turns. The provision on the North side of Eastwood is free of obstructions while the ones on the South side (in front of Autumn Hall) have small islands installed making it a more difficult turn. I have seen pickup trucks and others have to stop to drive over the curb/island creating a dangerous situation. What was the logic to this design?
